duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and drive operations initiatives for a high impact site supporting Parker Hose Products Division.
Implement the Parker Lean system and Win Strategy to ensure a safe work environment, maximize profitable growth, drive quality improvements, and provide premier customer service.
Oversee day-to-day activities to meet daily, monthly, quarterly, and yearly expectations.
Oversee Value Stream P&L’s, cost analysis, product line margin, PPV goals, and manufacturing productivity.
Lead the Value Stream in daily operations and continuous improvements, including supply chain production control and coordination of activities with off-shift management.
Create the basis for continuous improvement and employee empowerment, ensuring that standardized work/processes are followed and safety requirements are met.
Work with the Division Staff to develop future state value stream map and manage plans to achieve it.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor Degree or equivalent; Masters preferred
